# Creating datasets by variable category. These are used to create a smaller and more manageable, final exposure dataset.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load, results='hide'}

# import raw UKB dataset
dat <- readRDS("/Users/austin.argentieri/OneDrive - Nexus365/DPhil Research/UKB/Datasets/2. First raw dataset from UKB/ukb42114.rds")

library(Hmisc)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r elf, results='hide'}

### Early life factors
elf <- 
    subset(dat,
           select = c(
               Cs(
                   f.eid,
                   f.1647.0.0,
                   f.1677.0.0,
                   f.1687.0.0,
                   f.1697.0.0,
                   f.1707.0.0,
                   f.1767.0.0,
                   f.1777.0.0,
                   f.1787.0.0,
                   f.20022.0.0,
                   f.120.0.0,
                   f.20115.0.0,
                   f.20489.0.0,
                   f.20488.0.0,
                   f.20487.0.0,
                   f.20490.0.0,
                   f.20491.0.0
               )
           ))

old_cols <- colnames(elf)

elf <- 
    rename(elf,
           eid = f.eid,    
           country_birth = f.1647.0.0,
           breastfed = f.1677.0.0,
           body_size_10yrs_old = f.1687.0.0,
           height_10yrs_old = f.1697.0.0,
           handedness = f.1707.0.0,
           adopted = f.1767.0.0,
           part_multiple_birth = f.1777.0.0,
           maternal_smoking = f.1787.0.0,
           birth_weight = f.20022.0.0,
           birth_weight_known = f.120.0.0,
           country_birth_non_UK = f.20115.0.0,
           childhood_love = f.20489.0.0,
           childhood_physical_abuse = f.20488.0.0,
           childhood_hate = f.20487.0.0,
           childhood_sex_abuse = f.20490.0.0,
           childhood_doctor = f.20491.0.0
    )

new_cols <- colnames(elf)
column_key_elf <- as.data.frame(cbind(old_cols, new_cols))

save(elf, 
     column_key_elf,
     file = "/Users/austin.argentieri/OneDrive - Nexus365/DPhil Research/UKB/Datasets/4. Categorized raw datasets/ukb_elf.RData")
```

